thread.title: Lead Financial Analyst at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (West Chester, PA)
thread.title_full: Lead Financial Analyst at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (West Chester, PA)

title: Lead Financial Analyst at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (West Chester, PA)
text: Classification: Financial Analyst-Manager Compensation: DOE Our client, an industry leader in Chester County, PA is currently looking for a Lead Financial Analyst due to growth! The Lead Financial Analyst will be highly visible within the organization and have the following responsibilities: Establish, modify, document, and implement financial controls, such as accounting reconciliations. Ensure discrepancies/outages are researched and corrected. Analyze documentation of financial projects and coordinate related deliverables. Prepare, review and verify the accuracy of financial data. Actively participate or lead senior management meetings. Recommend and implement accounting methods and procedures as necessary. Support fulfillment of external and internal audit, SOX, regulatory and state exam requests. Direct the work of financial analysts and assist other staff as necessary. If you're interested in this, or similar Lead Financial Analyst opportunities, send resume to Jared.Scholl@RobertHalf.com for consideration.
